ingredients.item: 275g green winter cabbage, such as Savoy, shredded

instructions.step: Blend the peanut butter in a bowl with 4 tbsp boiling water. Add the lime juice, soy sauce and sugar and mix well. Place the noodles in a heatproof bowl and cover with boiling water. Leave to soften while frying the vegetables.
Heat the wok oil in a large frying pan or wok. Add the cabbage and carrots and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Drain the noodles and tip into the pan with the beansprouts. Add the peanuts and sauce and cook for 1–2 minutes, stirring. Serve immediately.
